articles.author: Lisa O'Carroll
articles.title: How the EU Digital Services Act affects Facebook, Google and others - The Guardian
articles.description: Threat of big fines and EU-wide ban hoped to curb manipulative practices and harmful content
articles.content: Unprecedented regulation forcing more than 40 online giants including Facebook, X, Google and TikTok to better police the content they deliver within the EU is due to come into force on 25 August. So… [+5218 chars]
